dmca.title: Copied Website
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 4:25 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3336361D] Copied Website ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copied Website Added by system at Monday, Mar 5 2007 12:07 pm X-MailFrom: webmaster@casinocashjourney.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Mar 5 12:04:31 2007 Received: (qmail 12102 invoked by alias); 5 Mar 2007 18:04:31 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 12099 invoked from network); 5 Mar 2007 18:04:31 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 5 Mar 2007 18:04:31 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 5 Mar 2007 11:11:12 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Mon, 05 Mar 2007 11:11:12 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from webmaster@casinocashjourney.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HOGiO-0004Z3-7D for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 11:11:12 -0600 Received: from [82.112.125.168] (helo=journeytocanada.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from webmaster@casinocashjourney.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HOGiJ-000MxC-Er for abuse@theplanet.com; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 11:11:07 -0600 Received: from OwnerPC (STCTON10-1177991939.sdsl.bell.ca [70.54.187.3]) (authenticated bits=0) by journeytocanada.com (8.13.6.20060614/8.13.6) with ESMTP id l25HB0MH043032; Mon, 5 Mar 2007 12:11:00 -0500 (EST) Message-ID: From: "Casino Cash Journey" To: Cc: , Subject: Copied Website Date: Mon, 5 Mar 2007 12:10:52 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0088_01C75F1F.51F7FCE0" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Windows Mail 6.0.6000.16386 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.0.6000.16386 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Mar 2007 17:11:12.0446 (UTC) FILETIME=[469045E0:01C75F49] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Hello Support, We are contacting you in regards to a site that has used our content and format without our knowledge or permission. The site is called http://www.slotclicks.com. They have copied our site in its entirety - design, content and images, absolutely everything word-for-word from our site http://www.casinocashjourney.com. The site http://www.slotclicks.com is being hosted by ThePlanet.com. The server's IP address is 70.85.217.100. While the main page is not visible, all other internal pages are. Our name Casino Cash Journey, is visible in the header and throughout the entire site. We have full screen shots and downloaded the entire site http://www.slotclicks.com. Please see the examples below: Casino Listings A to B Our site http://www.casinocashjourney.com/casino_listing.htm Their site http://slotclicks.com/casino_listing.htm Bingo Our site http://www.casinocashjourney.com/bingo.htm Their site http://slotclicks.com/bingo.htm Top 10 Casinos Our site http://www.casinocashjourney.com/top_10_casinos.htm Their site http://slotclicks.com/top_10_casinos.htm There are several more pages that have been taken and that we can provide examples of. Our web site has been in operation since March 2001 and our company has been in operation since 1999. Our content is original and written by us. This can be verified by using the internet archive at http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.casinocashjourney.com. We will be following our procedures to have our content removed. For the protection of our company and website, this e-mail is also being sent to all of our clients, all of the major search engines including Google (DCMA) and all proper authorities to inform them that our content has been used without our knowledge or permission. We are not sure of their intentions and that is of great concern to us. We have tried to contact the operator of this site and will keep trying. Can you please assist us in removing this site. We would appreciate any help you can give us. Your company removed this site in the past (on July 24, 2006) and we are not sure why it is appearing once again. Thank You, Nick Muia http://www.CasinoCashJourney.com Madison Linden Inc. MIME element (text/html)
Hello Support,

 

We are contacting you in regards to a site that has used our content and format without our knowledge or permission. The site is called http://www.slotclicks.com.  They have copied our site in its entirety
